category.name: Maintenance.File Caching
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Volume_Max_Files_Per_Dir
preference.preference_description: Specifies the maximum number of allowed files in a sub-directory in a volume. The system automatically creates new sub-directories for storing new files, once the current sub-directory has reached this limit. Setting this value to 0 effectively disables this feature, so all files being created go into the same (current) sub-directory in the volume. Very low values can affect the performance of the system. Values less than 10000 will be converted to a default minimum value of 10000. Suggested values are in the range 100000 - 500000 for most file systems.
